docker_config.frontend/Dockerfile:
FROM node:18-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
RUN npm run build
EXPOSE 3000
CMD ["npm", "start"]
docker_config.backend/Dockerfile:
FROM node:18-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
EXPOSE 5000
CMD ["npm", "start"]

k8s_manifests.deployment.yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: Simple Scientific Calculator Website
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: Simple Scientific Calculator Website
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: Simple Scientific Calculator Website
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: app
        image: Simple Scientific Calculator Website:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
